name: Eldritch Flux Coil
desc:
Increases flux capacity by %s, flux dissipation by %s, and dissipates hard flux at %s of the normal rate while shields are on.
Only works if installed on a single ship.
Devours %s crew members every %s days.
(Note: Will still devour crew even if installed onto multiple ships and thus rendered non-functional).
short: Increases flux capacity and dissipation. Adds a slight amount of hard flux dissipation. Devours a crew member every few days.

name: Exotic Ammunition
desc: Augment your ballistic projectile-based weapons with Exotic Matter, causing them deal an extra %s damage. The exotic materials will cause all projectiles to travel %s faster
short: Ballistic weapons do more damage and travel faster.

name: Exotic Armor
desc:
Increases the ship's armor by %s/%s/%s/%s points, depending on hull size. Reduces hull by %s and increases maneuverability by %s.
Armor: +%s
short: Increases armor and maneuverability, reduces hull.

name: Exotic Crystalline Lenses
desc: Increases beam damage by %s, beam flux cost by %s, beam range by %s.
short: Increases beam damage, flux cost, and range.

name: Exotic Engines
desc: Increases the ship's top speed in combat by %s su/second regardless of hull size.
short: Increases combat speed.

name: External Cargo Container
desc:
Increases ship cargo capacity at the cost of speed, maneuverability, and armor.
Cargo Capacity: %s
Speed: %s
Maneuverability: %s
Armor: %s
short: Increases cargo capacity at the cost of speed, maneuverability, and armor

name: Flux Capacitor
desc:
Increases the ship's flux capacity by %s/%s/%s/%s, depending on hull size, reduces flux dissipation by %s/%s/%s/%s.
Flux Capacity: %s
Flux Dissipation: %s
short: Increases flux capacity and reduces flux dissipation.

name: Flux Funnel
desc: Allows the ship to dissipate hard flux at %s of the normal rate while shields are on.
short: Allows dissipation of hard flux while shields are up.

name: Flux Network
desc:
Increases the ship's flux dissipation by %s/%s/%s/%s, depending on hull size.
If flux goes above %s/%s the network will begin generating hard flux at the same rate.
Flux Dissipation: %s
short: Increases flux dissipation at low flux, generates hard flux at high flux.

name: Gauss Coils
desc: Increases ballistic weapon flux cost by %s and rate of fire by %s.
short: Increases the flux cost and rate of fire for ballistic weapons.

name: Heavy Bulkheads
desc: Increases the ship's hull integrity by %s and armor by %s/%s/%s/%s, reduces maneuverability by %s. If disabled, the ship will not break apart and is almost always recoverable after the battle.
short: Increases hull integrity and armor, reduces maneuverability.

name: Hyperspace Comm Array
desc:
This comm array connects to the relay network every %s days to gather information about the sector, it replaces most of your armor and slows your ship down.
It can only be equipped on Cruisers and Capital ships.
Also it only accesses up to %s pieces of information when it connects.
short: Gain intel anywhere in the sector, lose armor and move speed

name: Integrated Magazines
desc: Increases the ammo capacity of ballistic and energy weapons by %s, reduces hull integrity by %s.
short: Increases ballistic and energy ammo capacity at the cost of max hull.

name: Missile Reloader
desc:
An autoforge inside the ship periodically reloads the magazines of all missile weapons. 
Takes between %s and %s seconds to restore %s/%s of max ammo (minimum 1).
short: Periodically reloads all missile weapons.

name: Patroller Refit
desc:
This refit alters the ship's engines and sensor arrays to focus entirely on speed and power to better ensure that pirates can neither run nor hide.
Burn Level: %s
Max Speed: %s
Maneueverability: %s
Sensor Strength: %s
Sensor Profile: %s
short: Increases burn speed and tactical speed, at the cost of maneueverability. Increases sensor strength at the cost of sensor profile

name: Realigned Thrusters
desc: Increases ship maneuverability by %s but reduces max speed by %s.
short: Increases maneuverability, reduces speed.

name: Scaffolding
desc: Dramatically increases available space, but the engines don't work while this is installed. For use only while docked.
short: Increases available OP but renders ship immobile.

name: Shield Calibration (Arc)
desc:
Calibrates your shield emitters to stretch their protective arc to its limits.
Shield Arc: %s
Shield Flux/Damage Ratio: %s
Shield Turn Speed: %s
Shield Unfold Speed %s
short: Increases shield arc while decreasing its strength and speed

name: Shield Calibration (Reinforcement)
desc:
Calibrates your shield emitters to reinforce their resistance to damage.
Shield Upkeep: %s
Shield Flux/Damage Ratio: %s
short: Increases shield flux upkeep but improves flux to damage ratio.

name: Shield Calibration (Speed)
desc:
Calibrates your shield emitters to maximize their speed.
Shield Turning Speed: %s
Shield Unfolding Speed: %s
Shield Arc: %s
short: Increases shield turn rate and extension speed.

name: Silent Engine Assembly
desc:
Increases the durability of the ship's engines by %s, and the ship's hull integrity by %s.

The ship's sensor profile is reduced by %s, but its maximum burn level is also reduced by %s.
short: Makes engines harder to disable, lowers sensor profile, reduces max burn.

name: Specialized Engines
desc: Increases maximum burn level by %s. Decreases maneuverability by %s. Halves armor.
short: Increases maximum burn level at the cost of maneverability and armor.

name: Supercapacitors
desc: Increases energy and beam weapon damage by %s, flux cost by %s, and reduces their rate of fire by %s.
short: Increases energy and beam weapon damage and flux cost but reduces their rate of fire

name: Superior Turret Gyros
desc: Increases the turn rate of all turrets by %s. Reduces armor by %s/%s/%s/%s depending on hull size.
short: Increases turret turn rate.

name: Tuned Sensors
desc:
A highly tuned sensor grid, its primary benefit is in combat effectiveness, increasing sight range by %s.
Also increases sensor strength by %s.
short: Increases combat vision and sensor strength.

desc:
Calibrates all ballistic weapons to focus on damage.
Damage: %s
Flux Cost: %s
Range: %s
Rate of Fire: %s
short: Increases ballistic weapon damage at the cost of flux efficiency, range, and rate of fire.

Damage: %s

Range: %s
